DOC.brief_summary: This study investigates the beneficial effects of prefrontal brain stimulation (with transcranial direct current stimulation [tDCS]) during working memory training in seniors with mild cognitive impairments.The placebo-controlled double blinded study includes 50 elderly patients which will be randomized into verum or sham tDCS.
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Ability Training for Seniors With Mild Cognitive Impairment
